alert.note: Alert for Gibson; Henry; Obion; Weakley (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 12 at 8:55AM CDT until August 12 at 9:45AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Weakley County in west Tennessee... Northeastern Gibson County in west Tennessee... Obion County in west Tennessee... Northwestern Henry County in west Tennessee... * Until 945 AM CDT. * At 855 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Hickman, moving southeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Martin, Union City, Fulton, Dresden, South Fulton, Greenfield, Troy, Kenton, Bradford, Sharon, Latham, Palmersville, Clayton, Woodland Mills, Rives, Sandhill, Mount Pelia, Jones Mill, Ruthville and Crossland. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
